name: a walk with a spark
description:
drag one character into fire to be used as a weapon and put it out before it dies

                                                                                                                                                                                                       p.s all art from the game was from the asset pack provided and the things that do not look like they were, were me mashing together sprites from the asset pack. like the tree was a dead bush and vines mashed-up and the blue outlines of the nontransparent asset pack to make the tree blue and the main characters are the sound buttons rotated.
